Headline: Data Scientist
Summary: I bridge the gap between data and climate policy as a data scientist.  I work with climate scientists and the data they collect to extract insights and ensure appropriate action is taken by policy makers. My favorite activity is an ocean plunge, any time, any weather. This motivates me to inform and guide decision making towards a healthy relationship with our natural world.  Skills: Python, machine learning, SQL, data cleaning and preprocessing, ETL, Microsoft Azure, dashboard reporting, web application development.
